channel.title: retail on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in retail on Konigi

item.title: Exclusive Reels
item.description: The team over at mediumrare (www.mrare.ca) are proud to launch their latest site - Exclusive Reels. http://www.exclusivereels.com/

item.title: Erath Winery
item.description: From out of Oregon's Dundee Hills rolls a new web presence for its founding winery, those consummate Pinot masters who combine the "Art of Pinot" with the winemaker's pharmacological science to trample out the vintage where The Grapes Of Erath are stored at http://www.erath.com. Visualize a glass of Fuqua or Niederberger's best, or, if you're feeling prime time, maybe a glass of pink from their Melrose vineyard, and enjoy their new website :).

item.title: MILLIMETER/MILLIGRAM
item.description: I like the minimalist design. Seems like a a good candidate for creating the layout in CSS rather than tables, and using system text rather than graphics. http://www.mmmg.net/home/index.php

item.title: Razorfashion Retail Experience
item.description: Razorfashion Retail Experience from Razorfish - Emerging Experiences on Vimeo. Razorfish shows off their concept for touch screen retail experiences using the Razorfish Touch Framework. http://emergingexperiences.com/2009/05/introducing-the-razorfashion-retail-experience/

item.title: howies
item.description: My friend Carl told me about howies a while ago, but I only recently had a look back. They're a clothing and accessories company that aims at providing products with materials and construction that are meant to last and can be handed down to others for reuse. What I like most is how they use storytelling to provide a picture about materials in their products and their handmedown idea, which is communicated in its own mini site.
